abilities.name: Golden Arrow
abilities.description: Deals 400 (100% AP) magical damage to an enemy.

abilities.name: Scatter Golden Arrows
abilities.description: Deals 200 + 50% AP to ALL enemies. When used, Kagome gains 25% AP for 6 turns based on the number of enemies hit (25% for 1 enemy, 50% for 2 enemies, 75% for 3 enemies, etc). If the buff is already active, using this ability resets the buff duration but does not increase the AP bonus.

abilities.name: Spiritwalk
abilities.description: Kagome stuns herself for 4 turns, gains 200% magic shield and armor (for the duration as buff) and heals herself when ability is used by 1000HP.

abilities.name: Spirit Scream
abilities.description: Deals 200% of Kagome's magical damage to ALL enemies and removes all their active buffs.

passive.name: Atlantean Blessing
passive.description: Heals HP equal to 100% of your missing mana at the start of each turn.
